commit.message:
PR c++/10555, c++/10576

	PR c++/10555, c++/10576
	* pt.c (lookup_template_class): Handle class template with
	multiple levels of parameters when one of the levels contain
	errors.

	* g++.dg/template/memclass1.C: New test.

From-SVN: r66634

+	multiple levels of parameters when one of the levels contain
